00023 #include "Date.h"
00024 
00025 string Date::getMon(string mmm)
00026 {
00027         boost::to_upper(mmm);
00028         if(mmm=="JAN")return "01";
00029         else if(mmm=="FEB")return "02";
00030         else if(mmm=="MAR")return "03";
00031         else if(mmm=="APR")return "04";
00032         else if(mmm=="MAY")return "05";
00033         else if(mmm=="JUN")return "06";
00034         else if(mmm=="JUL")return "07";
00035         else if(mmm=="AUG")return "08";
00036         else if(mmm=="SEP")return "09";
00037         else if(mmm=="OCT")return "10";
00038         else if(mmm=="NOV")return "11";
00039         else if(mmm=="DEC")return "12";
00040         else return "-1";
00041 }
00042 
00043 Date::Date()
00044 {
00045         time_t rawtime;
00046         struct tm * timeinfo;
00047         time (&rawtime);
00048         timeinfo = localtime(&rawtime);
00049         string tem;
00050         tem.append(asctime(timeinfo));
00051         boost::replace_all(tem,"\n","");
00052         boost::replace_all(tem,"  "," ");
00053         vector<string> temp,vemp;
00054         boost::iter_split(temp,tem,boost::first_finder(" "));
00055         this->dayw = temp.at(0);
00056         this->monthw = temp.at(1);
00057         this->month = getMon(monthw);
00058         this->day = temp.at(2);
00059         boost::iter_split(vemp,temp.at(3),boost::first_finder(":"));
00060         this->hh = vemp.at(0);
00061         this->mm = vemp.at(1);
00062         this->ss = vemp.at(2);
00063         this->year = temp.at(4);
00064 }
00065 
00066 Date::~Date() {
00067         // TODO Auto-generated destructor stub
00068 }
00069 
00070 int Date::getMonth()
00071 {
00072         if(this->month!="")
00073                 return boost::lexical_cast<int>(this->month);
00074         else
00075                 return boost::lexical_cast<int>(this->getMon(this->monthw));
00076 }
00077

00079 {
00080         this->month = month;

00183 string Date::toString()
00184 {
00185         return dayw+" "+monthw+" "+day+" "+hh+":"+mm+":"+ss+" "+year;
00186 }
